saveInvoice(Table) - Static method in class invoice.InvoiceController
Creates the invoice of an order, saves it into the invoice file, displays it to the user and clears the order from the table.
saveInvoiceUI() - Static method in class invoice.InvoiceUI
Prompts the user to enter the number of the table that is ready to pay for their order.

Saves changes made to the menu items in the menu file.

Saves changes made to the promotion items in the promotion file.
saveTable(Table) - Static method in class table.TableController
Saves all changes made to a table.

Contains methods to create, read and write .dat files.
